title: .....MF change.
body:
more like a nerf than a change....may I ask...why? Yeah Ik is pbe...can be pulled or wtvr.

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4djOqjDrV80/WK4zo2X-ouI/AAAAAAABB9I/uaFBnt2RSC4b6bhpX4aCcxoMgt1DbglTQCLcB/s640/34141414.jpg

Yeah shes pretty good, with the changes on lethality and stuff.....but so is Jhin <,< or Varus....and its not like you guys gutted-nerfed this two boys, like youre doing it with MF with that "change"....youre removing all of her poke damage...maybe reduce the damage, but removed? for real?....remove the slow from Jhins ult <,< or remove he always crit with his last shot...it would be too harsh? his "Identity" would be too changed?....is the same change youre doing to the identity of MF right now.

replies.body:
So it seems that MF's new identity is this...

"Pick her if you want to press R to AOE damage the whole enemy team."

If you can't do this (team comps etc), don't pick her... forget about the whole lane bullying thing

> [{quoted}](name=Vlad Maine ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lwKV2xHz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-23T05:43:42.876+0000)
>
> So it seems that MF's new identity is this...
> 
> "Pick her if you want to press R to AOE damage the whole enemy team."

{{champion:29}} sadface
It already does bonus damage on the second target, it really doesnt need 1 shot you considering how powerful her ult is.

she always had the extra damage...her previous double up had even more damage...

"ACTIVE: Miss Fortune fires a shot at the target enemy, which then bounces to hit another unit behind it, dealing physical damage to the primary target and increased physical damage to the secondary one (applies on-hit effects to both)

Double Up's second shot prioritizes units directly behind the primary target, especially enemy champions affected by  Impure Shots. If the primary target is killed, the second hit critically strikes for 150% base critical strike damage."

> [{quoted}](name=Leu07,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lwKV2xHz,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2017-02-24T17:25:10.556+0000)
>
> she always had the extra damage...her previous double up had even more damage...
> 
> "ACTIVE: Miss Fortune fires a shot at the target enemy, which then bounces to hit another unit behind it, dealing physical damage to the primary target and increased physical damage to the secondary one (applies on-hit effects to both)
> 
> Double Up's second shot prioritizes units directly behind the primary target, especially enemy champions affected by  Impure Shots. If the primary target is killed, the second hit critically strikes for 150% base critical strike damage."

So what?
 
They also more than doubled her ult damage on the mini rework, somethings gotta give.

> [{quoted}](name=Leu07,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lwKV2xHz,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2017-02-24T17:25:10.556+0000)
>
> she always had the extra damage...her previous double up had even more damage...
> 
> "ACTIVE: Miss Fortune fires a shot at the target enemy, which then bounces to hit another unit behind it, dealing physical damage to the primary target and increased physical damage to the secondary one (applies on-hit effects to both)
> 
> Double Up's second shot prioritizes units directly behind the primary target, especially enemy champions affected by  Impure Shots. If the primary target is killed, the second hit critically strikes for 150% base critical strike damage."

That was added on right before her rework. The thing is the current one is a damage amp on the second hit that also procs her passive and can crit on its damage and her passive. So actually no her new one is much stronger. You seem to forget that her current Q applies her new passive which can also crit. So you take her new Q and add in her passive and the damage is pretty fucking stupid on minion kill.

> [{quoted}](name=RexSaur,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lwKV2xHz,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-02-23T05:53:35.433+0000)
>
> It already does bonus damage on the second target, it really doesnt need 1 shot you considering how powerful her ult is.

Powerful upfront damage and powerful ranged damage with ult. I wonder who that sounds like... {{champion:202}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:202}}

Lane bullying? Oh that's toxic mechanics. Nevermind about {{champion:51}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:119}}. {{champion:115}} bullies you in bot lane from afar then destroys your tower? Oh that's completely healthy.
Lane bullies can be played around

To be fair, Draven bullies you from pretty up close.
Doesn't make it any easier, but his range isn't that long.

> [{quoted}](name=Leu07,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lwKV2xHz,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-02-23T05:42:25.824+0000)
>
> more like a nerf than a change....may I ask...why? Yeah Ik is pbe...can be pulled or wtvr.
> 
> https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4djOqjDrV80/WK4zo2X-ouI/AAAAAAABB9I/uaFBnt2RSC4b6bhpX4aCcxoMgt1DbglTQCLcB/s640/34141414.jpg
> 
> Yeah shes pretty good, with the changes on lethality and stuff.....but so is Jhin &lt;,&lt; or Varus....and its not like you guys gutted-nerfed this two boys, like youre doing it with MF with that &quot;change&quot;....youre removing all of her poke damage...maybe reduce the damage, but removed? for real?....remove the slow from Jhins ult &lt;,&lt; or remove he always crit with his last shot...it would be too harsh? his &quot;Identity&quot; would be too changed?....is the same change youre doing to the identity of MF right now.

It is not going to change MF, Quote, "Double Up (Q) - [removed - "If the first shot kills its target, the second deals 50% increased damage."\

Reference:
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2017/02/222-pbe-update.html

If this change goes through, she will continue to be a lane bully. We have to harass before we last hit a minion, no big deal. 

I thought you meant the damage decreased.

> [{quoted}](name=Rhymund,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lwKV2xHz,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-02-23T06:19:42.695+0000)
>
> It is not going to change MF, Quote, "Double Up (Q) - [removed - "If the first shot kills its target, the second deals 50% increased damage."\
> 
> Reference:
> http://www.surrenderat20.net/2017/02/222-pbe-update.html
> 
> If this change goes through, she will continue to be a lane bully. We have to harass before we last hit a minion, no big deal. 
> 
> I thought you meant the damage decreased.

It's lowering Miss Fortune's skill cap for no reason. She may need a nerf (though personally I think it's lethality that needs the nerf), but trimming her kit down by removing abilities is not the right way to go about it.

she is busted AND one if not THE EASIEST adc
I was playing a tank and front lining and she ulted and killed my entire back line... balance?
she needs a nerf to her ult but this works to.
._. if you let her channel her full ult, and your team didnt burn the flash or wtvr to get out they deserved to get killed.

> [{quoted}](name=Leu07,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lwKV2xHz,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-02-24T17:20:02.350+0000)
>
> ._. if you let her channel her full ult, and your team didnt burn the flash or wtvr to get out they deserved to get killed.

Her ult doesn't have to full channel to do upwards of 2k damage. Even a half channel puts out about 2k.

> [{quoted}](name=control 2,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lwKV2xHz,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-02-23T19:03:25.743+0000)
>
> she is busted AND one if not THE EASIEST adc
> I was playing a tank and front lining and she ulted and killed my entire back line... balance?
> she needs a nerf to her ult but this works to.

If she ulted and killed your entire backline, your team wasn't that smart. Her ult is pretty easy to escape from, and the back line should be far enough away that they can literally take a step backwards and get out. 
Also, if you were a tank and didn't displace or stun her, then you weren't tanking right or you weren't playing a Juggernaut and not a tank.
Lethality makes up for it sweetheart.
